name: Lost Soul (Unicorn Studios)
description:
Lost Soul was made in less than 72 hours for the Global Game Jam 2021

Theme: After The Storm

All assets, sounds, and code were made during the jam period (apart from basic scripts and a few sounds).

Prologue

The Demon King has taken your soul! You have traveled to the underworld in hopes to find the King and reclaim your soul!

Controls
  • Move: A & D
  • Interact: E"
  • Attack: "L"
  • Jump: "Space"
Social

If you enjoyed my game and would like to support me, feel free to follow me on social media or leave a donation on one of my games :)
